content: magical bookmarks #3 ginny s directions cast on 15 sts with the longtail cast on bookmark row 1-5 knit 5 row row 6 k3 purl 9 k3 row 7 knit one row row 8 & all even row knit 3 purl 9 knit 3 row 9 knit 7 yo ssk knit to end of row row 11 knit 5 k2tog yo k1 yo ssk knit 5 row 13 knit 4 k2tog yo k3 yo ssk knit 4 row 15 knit 3 k2tog yo k5 yo ssk knit 3 row 17 knit 4 yo ssk k3 k2tog yo knit 4 row 19 knit 5 yo ssk k1 k2tog yo knit 5 row 21 knit 6 yo s1 k2tog psso yo knit 6 row 22 - end repeat row 9 - 21 three more times 4x total then work row 6 - 8 once and then row 1 - 5 once bind off loosely and weave in ends abbreviations 2 ¼ by 7 ¼ rectangular bookmark notes sts = stitches yo = yarn over make sure to block your bookmark because blocking opens up the lace and helps the k2tog = knit 2 stitches together garter stitch stay flat ssk = slip two stitches knitwise then knit them together through the back loops materials s1 = slip one stitch ● 3 5mm us 4 straight knitting needles psso = pass slipped stitch over ● 25-30 yards fingering weight yarn © 2020 elizabeth caneday @inlovewithfranceknits
